short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hop the paywall, browse a cleaner web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 12ft Pro is a browser extension that will automatically remove paywalls, banner ads, and other popups your favorite websites. You can try the service for free at 12ft.io, the extension just does it better and automatically.
